Entries.Event.cs.1068: Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}} charged me {0}g for the hospital visit.
Entries.Event.cs.1070: I have no money, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}} was obligated to save my life free of charge.
Entries.Event.cs.1584: Your grange display has been judged. Return to Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} for the result!
Entries.Event.cs.1597: Wow, I got a low score. I guess Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} isn't much of a fish {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Man:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisGender}}}}. Oh well...$s
Entries.Event.cs.1761: ...You're right. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}}... Ugh, God... I'm a horrible, *hic*... selfish person.$7#$b#Now I feel even worse...$7
Entries.Farmer.cs.1918: You received 15 Parsnip Seeds!^^'Here's a little something to get you started.^-Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}'
Entries.Game1.cs.3180: Nothing happens. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SandyName}} said something about 'infusing it with the power of Yoba'.
Entries.NPC.cs.3990: A human visitor? This is most unusual...#$e#I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KrobusName}}, merchant of rare and exotic goods.
Entries.GameLocation.cs.8525: Come back when {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreName}}'s tending the shop.
Entries.ShopMenu.cs.11508: *sigh*... When the door opened I thought it might be {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}.
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12051: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honor the family name, my boy. Good luck.^^Love, Grandpa^^P.S. If {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} is still alive say hi to the old {{LewisGuy}} for me, will ya?
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12055: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honor the family name, my dear. Good luck.^^Love, Grandpa^^P.S. If {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} is still alive say hi to the old {{LewisGuy}} for me, will ya?
Entries.MultiplayerUtility.cs.12488: Your grange display has been judged. Return to Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}} for the result!
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13228: The local {0} population is starting to threaten other species. If you can fish {1} of them for me, it would be a big help.   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13248: Trying to keep the art o' fishing alive... I'll pay {0}g to any fisherman who catches {1} {2}. Good luck!  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13251: Trying to keep the art o' fishing alive... I'll pay {0}g to any fishing enthusiast who catches {1} {2}. Good luck!  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WillyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13311:
Greetings! {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}} here. Could someone please bring me {0}?
I'm studying them as part of my biological research.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13314: Looking to dissect {0}. Please deliver to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}} at 24 Mountain Road.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13317: Howdy neighbors! My goats are really hankerin' for {0}. I can't find any myself! Help?     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13320: Howdy neighbors! I want to try giving my cows {0} to increase their milk production. If you find one could you swing it by for me?.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13324: Feeling gloomy... {0} might cheer me up.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13327: ...feel like throwing {0} as hard as I can against the mountain face. Please deliver to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}} at 24 Mountain Road.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13378:
Feeling gloomy... {0} might cheer me up.
     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13381: ...feel like {0} for some reason. Please bring to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}} at 24 Mountain Road.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13446: A paste of fresh {0} makes a wonderful tonic for {1}. If you find one, I could put it to good use.       -Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13462: Hi! I need {0} for a new appetizer I'm thinking about. Drop one off at the saloon and I'll be very grateful.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GusName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13473: Hello, it's {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}. I'd like to buy {0} from someone, to craft into some fine jewelry. Thanks!
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13476: Looking for {0} to make into buttons for a dress I'm making. If you find one could you bring it to me?.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13546: I require {0} for potion-making. Please deliver directly to my study.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/IncompleteName:1{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardFirstName}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardName}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13548: The {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/IncompleteName:1{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardFirstName}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardName}}, wishes to study the arcane properties of the {0}. You will be rewarded.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13553: Local {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:LR{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}} in search of a fresh {0}.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13557: I will < you forever if you bring me {0}!     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13560: Looking for a handsome young man to bring me {0}.       -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13563: FOR GIRLS ONLY: psst... I need {0}... you know what it's for. Keep it secret, okay?      -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13568: Need {0} for a project I'm working on.    -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13580: Need {0} for my latest project. Help!    -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13583: I need {0} to power my latest invention. It's the ONLY thing that will work!       -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13593: I want to pull a prank on my {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PierreGender}}}}. I'll need {0}. Keep it secret :)      -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}}
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13647: I am looking for someone to bring me {0} {1}s{2}    -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}}
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13674: Hello! It's {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/RobinName}}. Could someone bring me {0} pieces of {1}? They need to be fresh... that means gathered today. Thanks!
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13688: - You can keep the ores after {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ClintName}} inspects them.
Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13747: An invasive crab species is living in the local mine, threatening the native wildlife! These creatures are known for disguising themselves as stones. I'll pay someone to slay {0} of them.  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}
Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13752: The monsters known as {0} are throwing the elemental balance into disarray. I would like an adventurer to enter the mines and slay {1} of these {2}.  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/IncompleteName:1{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardFirstName}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardName}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Wizard:R{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/WizardGender}}}}
Entries.SocializeQuest.cs.13786: Hey! Will someone say 'Hi' to everyone in town for me? I want to spread a message of {0} today!   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}
Entries.KrobusShopGone: I'm away. Please leave your payment in the box. -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KrobusName}}

Entries.Event.cs.1625: Aw, I gotta put on that thight dress again? I thought now that we're married... Well, alright.$s
Entries.Event.cs.1815: She thought everyone forgot, but then you show up with a nice gift. What a good friend.
Entries.Event.cs.1820: Ahh... Indeed. I see you in a room, having a conversation with a lady.
Entries.Event.cs.1831: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young lady. She looks a little bashful, but happy to be with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1832: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young lady. She looks quite hopeful, and eager to spend time with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1837: Hmmm... now what's this young lady's name? ... I believe it starts with an '{0}'.
Entries.NPC.cs.4437: I'm pregnant... can't you make your own breakfast?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4438: Ugh... I feel a little nauseated this morning.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4440: {0}, we're going to have a baby soon.$l

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and... well, wife!$h

Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13571: I would like a cute boy to bring me {0}.  (^_-)      -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13574: Looking for a friend to bring me {0}.       -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}

Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13571: Looking for a buddy to bring me {0}.       -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13574: I would like a cute girl to bring me {0}.  (^_-)      -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}
